name: Josh Shepherd
tagline:
My name is Josh Shepherd, a passionate and experienced games developer  
你好！欢迎来到我的网站
about:
Hi! My name is Josh and I love coding, music and video games! I've been programming since I started learning in 2015 and have always had a massive interest in playing and creating video games.

I will graduate from the University of Wolverhampton in 2021, studying Computer Science specializing in games development. Before University, I found my love for programming at an apprenticeship, where I began by working on projects such as assisting on a Unreal Engine 4 game, to developing a WPF application in C# for 3 years. Since then, I have consistently worked on projects in my own time and continued to develop myself and my skills.

I have been learning Chinese since 2016 and can speak to a near proficient level, but can understand and communicate effectively in reading and writing.
